before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"b9t4g","text":"Ensure benches and equipment are RNase free.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23pm5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1huog","text":"For RNase-Free DNase Set (Qiagen): Prepare DNase I stock solution by dissolving the lyophilized DNase I (1500 Kunitz units) in 550 µl of the RNase-free water. Mix gently by inverting the vial. Divide into single use aliquots and store at -20 °C. Thawed aliquots can be stored at 2–8°C for up to 6 weeks. Do not refreeze the aliquots after thawing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2oglj","text":"Extraction of total RNA from plant tissue using TRIzol (or TRI reagent) followed by DNA nuclease treatment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fk2i0","text":"TRI reagent and chloroform are hazardous - handle with care, operate in fume hood, wear vinly gloves and safety glasses.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

journals.name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
journals.citation: Li L, Duncan O, Ganguly DR, Lee CP, Crisp PA, Wijerathna-Yapa A, Salih K, Trösch J, Pogson BJ, Millar AH, Enzymes degraded under high light maintain proteostasis by transcriptional regulation in . Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America 119(20). doi: 10.1073/pnas.2121362119

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fbskq","text":"TRIzol (or TRI reagent)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r45","text":"Chloroform (or chloroform : IAA [24:1])","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ech6c","text":"Isopropanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr9na","text":"80% Ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gb27","text":"Nuclease-free H2O (e.g. 0.01% DEPC-treated H20) or Tris-EDTA (10 mM Tris-Cl, pH 6.5, 0.1 mM EDTA)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":15,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":44,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8eslq","text":"2 mL safe-lock Eppendorf tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fptaj","text":"1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ft48s","text":"Tissue lyser or mortar and pestle","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehcq5","text":"RNase-Free DNase Set (Qiagen)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7it99","text":"RNA loading dye, 2X (NEB)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7vruo","text":"Collect 50-100 mg of plant tissue and freeze immediately in liquid N2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":68,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27hsd","text":"Invert each tube by hand ~20x and incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes (DO NOT vortex samples as it may result in RNA degradation).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"arubt","text":"Centrifuge at 14,000 rcf for 10 minutes at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bq39q","text":"Repeat steps 4 and 5 (approx. 300-400 µL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5ilg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76c1p","text":"Note, if you are observing buffer and salt carryover in your purified RNA (high 230 nm absorbance), reduce volume of upper-phase recovered.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ujvq","text":"Add equal volume of 100% isopropanol, then mix by inverting tubes ~20x by hand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fjs8p","text":"Centrifuge samples at 14,000 rcf for 20 minutes at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81lge","text":"Add 1 mL of 80 % ethanol and invert tube ~10x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alevq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"20e6g","text":"Remove supernatant, carefully since the pellet often becomes dislodged at this step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7scu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8if7q","text":"Air-dry pellet at room temperature for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9g01","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u1tr","text":"Make up volume of RNA solution to 87.5 μL with nuclease-free water. This can be performed with an aliquot or total sample from the previous step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"asjtf","text":"Take 50-100 ng aliquot of RNA and mix 1:1 with 2X RNA loading dye (NEB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"culi1","text":"Grind tissue to fine powder under liquid N2 using tissue lyser or mortar + pestle, then immediately add 1 mL TRI reagent (1 mL per 100 mg tissue).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":42,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b07qa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq9u","text":"Note, achieving a fine grind is critical to high yields of intact RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0c5g","text":"Transfer the upper aqueous phase to a new microfuge tube (approx. 400-600 µL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h1po","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8i1a","text":"Incubate at -20°C for 1 hour. Alternatively, incubate overnight to capture small RNAs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89t31","text":"Add 1/5 volume of pre-mixed chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (24:1), cap tubes, shake vigorously (by hand) for 15 seconds (solution should become cloudy), then incubate at room temperature for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c4049","text":"Remove the supernatant, you should observe a white pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1jjis","text":"Centrifuge samples at 10,000 rcf for 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hu22","text":"Resuspend pellet in RNase-free water (e.g. 0.01% DEPC-treated water) or Tris-EDTA (10 mM Tris-Cl, pH 6.5, 0.1 mM EDTA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fn7p","text":"(Optional) If the expected RNA concentration is 10 µg/mL, add 1/10 volume of 3M NaOAc (pH 5.5) and/or 100 µg/mL GlycoBlue (or glycogen).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4f718","text":"Add 10 μL Buffer RDD and 2.5 μL DNase I stock solution (Qiagen RNase Free DNase Set) and mix with gentle pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ac8pf","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 5-10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"66qn9","text":"Add 500 μL of 100% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"538nk","text":"(Optional) Add 3 μL glycogen or GlycoBlue, and 10 μL NaOAc (pH 5.5) to aid RNA precipitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2a5i1","text":"Mix by gentle inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"82a3u","text":"Incubate samples for at least 1 hour at -20 °C (overnight, if purifying small RNAs).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eim2c","text":"Centrifuge at 14,000 rcf at 4 °C for 20 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4hplo","text":"Remove supernatant and rinse pellet with 1 mL of 80% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dkamt","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 rcf for 5 minutes at 4 °C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1raae","text":"Remove supernatant without disturbing pellet and air-dry for 2 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7cki","text":"Resuspend pellet in RNase-free water (e.g. 0.01% DEPC-treated water) or Tris-EDTA (10 mM Tris-Cl, pH 6.5, 0.1 mM EDTA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a4u8e","text":"Load and run samples on a 1% agarose TBE gel. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"493l7","text":"Incubate RNA at 65 °C for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f56d5","text":"Nanodrop RNA to check for purity and quantity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Plant RNA purification using TRIzol (TRI reagent)
title_html: Plant RNA purification using TRIzol (TRI reagent)

versions.title: Plant RNA extractions using TRI reagent
Plant RNA purification using TRIzol (TRI reagent)
versions.title_html: Plant RNA purification using TRIzol (TRI reagent)

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"c7god","text":"TRI reagent - hazardous","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o0t7","text":"Chloroform - hazardous","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6754n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cqh6","text":"Ensure you read SDS documents (attached) and organise appropriate waste vessels (fume hood).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
